content.text: Match ends, Girona 4, Xerez 2.
Second Half ends, Girona 4, Xerez 2.
Attempt saved. Mario Bermejo (Xerez) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juan Luis Redondo with a cross.
José Vega (Xerez) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Albert Dorca (Girona).
Goal!  Girona 4, Xerez 2. Ranko Despotovic (Girona) right footed shot from the left side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jandro.
Substitution, Girona. Borja Sánchez replaces Chechu.
Attempt missed. David Lombán (Xerez) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left from a direct free kick.
Albert Dorca (Girona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Rafael Barber (Xerez) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Albert Dorca (Girona).
Offside, Girona. Albert Dorca tries a through ball, but Roberto Peragón is caught offside.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Luso (Girona) because of an injury.
Substitution, Xerez. José Vega replaces Pablo Redondo.
Foul by Ranko Despotovic (Girona).
Leandro Gioda (Xerez) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Girona 3, Xerez 2. Chechu (Girona) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Roberto Peragón with a headed pass.

Ranko Despotovic (Girona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
